segments.text: What are you doing over the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planing to go bolling tonight.Tomorrow I was hoping to see a movie.What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to go camping , you know , just get a way for the weekend . I'm not sure I'll be able to , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have a lot of work . I'll see how to goes .
segments.speaker: S1
